title: CafePress Bite Me! Cap Baseball Cap
features: Spot clean with warm water and mild detergent, hang dry.

description: Heads-up, all you hat fans! This classic baseball cap features six-panels made of 100% brushed cotton. The bill molds to the shape you want and with an adjustable tab at the back, this baseball hat is a sure fit. For a nostalgic feel, this hat fits low with a soft crown. This stylish hat is perfect for any outfit - from jeans to khakis. With CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges.
